Retrieve Flair Version

Source: R/utils.R
get_flair_version.Rd

Gets the version of the installed Flair module in the current Python environment.

Usage

get_flair_version(...)

Value

Character string representing the version of Flair. If Flair is not installed, this may return NULL or cause an error.

On this page
